commands.?: print command line options and exit
commands.v: --version print the version information and exit
commands.p: --propfile <argument> the jmeter property file to use
commands.t:
--testfile <argument>
        the jmeter test(.jmx) file to run
commands.l:
--logfile <argument>
        the file to log samples to
commands.H:
--proxyHost <argument>
        Set a proxy server for JMeter to use
commands.P:
--proxyPort <argument>
        Set proxy server port for JMeter to use
commands.u:
--username <argument>
        Set username for proxy server that JMeter is to use
commands.a:
--password <argument>
        Set password for proxy server that JMeter is to use
commands.G:
--globalproperty <argument>=<value>
        Define Global properties (sent to servers)
        e.g. -Gport=123
         or -Gglobal.properties
commands.f:
--forceDeleteResultFile
        force delete existing results files and web report folder if present before starting the test
commands.r:
--runremote
        Start remote servers (as defined in remote_hosts)
commands.d:
--homedir <argument>
        the jmeter home directory to use
commands.X:
--remoteexit
        Exit the remote servers at end of test (CLI mode)
commands.g:
--reportonly <argument>
        generate report dashboard only, from a test results file
commands.e:
--reportatendofloadtests
        generate report dashboard after load test
